## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r echo = TRUE}
library(lubridate)

unzip('./activity.zip')
activity <- read.csv('./activity.csv')
activity[is.na(activity$steps),'steps'] <- -1
activity$date <- ymd(activity$date)
```
